BOULDER, Colo. — University of Colorado head coach Deion Sanders confirmed that he will have blood clot surgery, but he will not need to have his foot amputated.

articles.title: NBA fans bemoan ‘boring’ draft - Awful Announcing
articles.description: NBA fans were not impressed with the NBA Draft, with some saying relatively unknown players and ESPN's coverage led to a boring event.
articles.content:
The NBA held one of its marquee events Thursday night, the NBA Draft, and many fans tuned in and let out a huge collective yawn.
